attributes.action: Stop using spin and tell the truth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM recently said "All lower income and all pensioner households will be eligible for free loft and cavity wall insulation and other energy saving measures that could save them up to £300 a year in their energy bills."

It now turns out you need to be 70 and over!!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
